values: The day started out with such promise. I was able to divert to Dunkin Donuts and get real coffee..AHHHH that was nice. No one bawked that I got into work fifteen minutes late which is unusual....The bawking not me being late! Well then the wheels go off. I get called to the rug gallery to flip rugs for an interior design client. I may be Jafar in Aladdin but i sure has hell cant fly these babies so it is an ardous task.....I flip for 2 hours and forty minutes these retarded rugs and the client cant find one. I have 4 235 rugs ranging in all sizes and colors he cant find ONE! I expel it like a bad breath....OHH SA OH SA I rub my ears like Martin Lawrence in Bad Boys 2....IT doesnt help! Its here I notice a Tiger skin rug... seems we have a vendor who will make  a rug in the shape of a tiger skin rug....I proceed to wrap the tiger skin on my shoulders and sing some dididdies from the Lion King including that African Gibberish....All this whilst riding down the escalator! It was my moment of zen. It was also the last moment of piece I would have. Did I mention it was a ten thousand dollar rug! IT amused me......The rest of  teh day was usual, too much to do no time...Then a Sewar Pipe backflowed and then the Sh@t really flowed....Hence my thirteen hour day which I ended up by spending time with a fellow ex bar tender who useed to work at tupelos with me. Now she works at Whooville and we caught up on all the gossip from the old days....She pointedly asked me why i was single..cause I am an asshole replies me....Ohh thats right I forgot says her....GOD LIFE IS GOOD!
http://bknight0523.livejournal.com/20898.html

And that is how my day started.   I wish I knew that The retail life involved so many muckety mucks coming and going. We have had nothing but VIP visit after VIP visit.Its a freaking dog and pony show. I had to prep my store for two vistis last week and theen today fro one that is actually pertinent to me. It is called called a Service and shortage visit and is geared towards operations. So I start to focus on that and low and behold I have absolutely no crew today....

So im am clearing out old furniture and tables etc., when i get a phone call that there are soem teenagers who wont get out of our mattress department.. Guess since I am all in black I am Security to....ANYWHOS I go to the department and tell the teens to leave. One of the douchebags decides to be confrontational. Well I am beyond caring and TOTALY CRANKY....some in the old circles might be referring to me as Asshole Tom now....so I come at the little prick pretty hard...Tell him to get the fuck out of my store.....This little Toad shit decides to stand his ground... I smile a Wolfish grin...and thank him for being Stupid..... First he says he was looking at Beds, told him to go to Dail a Mattress and dont forget to drop the last S  cause he couldnt afford ours....He begins to protest I just say get the fuck out... At this point one of the salesguys comes over. We have had many a beer together and often quote many a movie, he decides to play LETS FUCK WITH THE TWERP GAME...he begins to quote TANGO and CASH...HE says to me Your Not Gonna put a chair on hsis throat? And I reply Well Icant find a Piano...... THe Kid is now looking from one to the other and says to me whats your name...it just so hapens I am wearing my name badge so Ia ask him if he can read...He says yes but wants to write my name down....It was then he asked me for a pen!  I absolutely busted out laughing.....I said let me get this staright you want to write my name down and you want me to give you the pen.....I asked him how proud his parents were that the afterbirth survived......Even my coworker was stunned by this comment.... The kid was completely off and just started to leave and he said I want to rememeber your name....I walked him to the front reciting my name. the whole time..........
http://bknight0523.livejournal.com/20641.html

So I got Dispatched to Paul Loduca,s house to change a lightbulb. Yep thats right a lightbulb........ He purchased around 100K in furniture for his new condo and one of the Cabinets had a bad bulb. So they sent me.... Now mind you I normally dont mind, NORMALLY but Im not loving that place right now. I work for a company that thinks it part MIB and part PATTERNS OF FORCE from the original Star Trek Series....Basically a world that Models itself after Hitlers Gernmany becuase they Society was so orderly??????    The GM of the Gallery should be hoping around looking for HER PRECIOUS. If I had a volacano handy Id throw her in by her bulbous nose. She has apparently decided that i threaten her world and has been trying not so covertly lately to get me....

So I drive to Loduca's condo in a community that is for over 55 year olds.....Ahh the plot thickens! His Girlfriend is a lanky greek that wears high heels while unpacking her stuff.  Gum Cracking and some kind of animal print pants. I was almost expecting to see Michelle Pfeffier from MARRIED TO THE MOB. I kinda of just rolled my eyes and introduced myself. She kept calling me Tim, I would have offered to write some advice for repacking the merchandise becuase I doubt that Paulie will be here next season.....
http://bknight0523.livejournal.com/20367.html

Now that I have made a disclaimer........

I FUCKING HATE ILLEGAL FUCKING ALIENS......... Yes I am a bigot and a white supremacist and a..GULP REPUBLICAN....But Jesus H CHrist on a popsicle stick someone needs to send these beaners back down....They come to my country, dont bother learning my language, BUT I should respect them right.....HELL NO...... If I had my way Id pull down the statute of Liberty, smelt it down.......Its freaking French anyway and her torch would now be a Stop Sign. It Would read " Yo Guiero TACO BELL YO Guiero Hell" Do we not have enough Landscapers in this world anyway......

But I digress, let me tell you a story. On May 18th I was driving my car, and waiting to turn into my neighborhood. When I look in my rear view miroor and see this old beater of a car barreling down, he looks like he is about to change lanes so i look down and then next thing I know my glasses are flying into the windshield and all my stuff from my glove box is flying into my backseat.. Always wanted to be a crash test dummy.... So I get out of my car and this little frodo looking Mexican stars yelling at me " look what I did aye  aye aye" I took a step towards him and stopped, said to myself just a car, and thats what insurance is for....Right..... I look down at waht was left of My honda accords ass and go yeah thats definately waht insurance is for....

Well the cops come and all of a sudden Crash Banticoot The Wetback stops speaking English, I point out to the Officer his expired plates from Rhode Island and the police officer the decides to call his Ins company..Thats all He has. The funny thing is I used work for them in another life so I figure OK I can work the system.

Well now they tell me they need to speak to their insurede, ofcourse i say, but remind them that with the police report, my notification, and the fact I was hit from behind the clock was ticking.....

Long Story short, I end up eating the first $500 dollars of rental, becase they wouldnt agree yet, find out my car which I almost was done paying for was going to be totaled and a new used car would cost me around $450 a month. So I then come across a nice truck at my favorite Bar  The Main Event....Its one of the owners so I make an offer, and he says he just needs to check with someone else........Turns out one of the Guys in the kitchen was intersested......

I miss teh days when the Mexicans wer the Mexicants!
http://bknight0523.livejournal.com/20034.html

AVAST YE! I joined a troupe Called BlackSpot Productions, and we do a Pirate show at Festivals and Events, Sword Fights, Pistol Fring, treasure Hunt the works.....I need to come up with a Pirate Character name so im opening it up for discussion! We have 6 weekends booked including the Oyster Fest!

And of course sometimes its just me but hey got to have some fun.....

Life has been interesting at Bloomingdales these days..... Got back yet another tree that was sold! I feel bad for the driver, he has to deliver these stupid genuine looking Jurassic park prop pieces. I let him put it in the compactor and press the CRUSH Button. Consider it Salvaging with exterme prejudice. The Driver was very amused, His son who is not only taking a full curriculum but helps his dad Deliver my stuff on mondays was just shaking his head. After we were done crushing the 9 ft palm tree to smitherens, the son told me that the person was giving his dad a hard time and kept complaining about the fact that the leaves were scratching her ceiling.   Apparently she was berating Luis pretty bad so I decided to call her up. She began demanding damages for her ceiling. I then told her that My leaves were damaged by paint from her ceiling and that I would have to sell the tree at a lose, if I could even sell it all! I told i would forget about it and simply pay the driver a delivery fee and a pick up fee....She balked at that and said that her 8 and 1/2 foot ceiling had Gouges from ....THE 9 foot tree I interrupted. She claimed that she didnt know that, I asked her to read some of the information off her Sales receipt so I could confirm the credit.  Sure enough she reads 9 Feet Tall Bannana Palm tree. She asks what Im going to do, about what I ask? About her ceiling....She is persistent....Well now Im pretty much done with The Tree Killer so I say I wont look up if I go to her house. Its at this point she begins to stammer....She demands my name, I spell it real slowly.  I ask her why she would purchase The set piece from Gilligans Island when it wouldn't have fit? Apparently she admitted she measured after the fact...dumb ass.....

Same thing we do every night Pinky......SHAMPOO THE RUG........

After a completely Bizarre Day, I came home to Shampoo the Den Rug, WHile Trigg was out of town And I was playing in teh Mouse House we had a leak which of course makes the den smell like ass. So we have been trying to get a handle on it.  Compared to my day I will take the stink. 

I was working in the gallery when I get a phone call from the Gallery Mananger  that the  GM of Both stores needs a favor. Last time he needed a favor I was up in white plains redoing there whole furniture department. Well ofcourse I said SURE...Not that I had an option.  So The favor is That I need to go to teh other store and help them get a handle on one of the Stock Rooms, did I mention it was Womens Shoes. So I get there and It was a freaking ZOO. There was shoes and shoe boxes all over the place. So I walk to the stock room and meet the head stock guy. He was told I was coming and apparently HE was told something different then I WAS!  Apparently they needed an executive in the department, so lets send The furniture Guy! Awesome......IT got to teh point wher i was getting shoes for xcutomers, and actually selling a few pairs, which I then handed off to two of the girls who were actually helping me. One of the older shoe hags decided to confront me on that. WHO DO YOU THINK YOU ARE...she says to me? Im the manager they sent over here today, but you didnt seem to really care when it was explained to you, was my reply. The look was priceless. I then see her trying to gleam my name off my nametag, I write it down for her and go Here this is easier for you! At this point the two girls i was working with were trying hard to stifle laughs...... As I was ending my time in Shoetopia, I was trying to get some shoes for a woman, looked for three pairs, we didnt have them in her size so she leaves.

She left and went to Furniture Gallery where I ran into her again. I helped her pick out a Mattress and told her we didnt have it in a size seven either!

A DANGEROUS PAST TIME.....I KNOW

As King Arthur would say in Camelot : PROCLAMATION: If a man is to be measured by what means do we do this? Some would say by the little things, but how exactly is one to measure the little things. Is it words is it deeds? It is a combination of that and more.

So I am here weighing this issue because apparently I have been letting down the masses lately. I will not make any excuses or offer any defenses but a simple request if i might. Tell me, you know what Im not that sensitive, I may be intuiative at times but if you are truly hurt by what i have done or not done please tell me....Otherwise you begin to question my character and the nature of our friendship.


I am at a point in my life that if you are in my world its becuase I truly want you there. I can say unabashadely that I love
teckboyny
,
scooby007a
and
frangi
 as much as my own brother. It doesnt mean Im Gay, not that there is anything wrong with that! But a few years ago I would not have been comfoertable enough to be that way.


I cant imagine a world that has No
dtwp
whose tires would I change and whose coffee would I drink. I have never had or will have a better friend or confidant.

Even my living arrangement.
jtrigg1
 The HORSEMAN Knows me well and He still lets me call his place home! He tolerates my Life Aquatic and the Mountains of STUFF as he calls it. 

Each and every person I chose, in turn choses me afterall isnt our family the ones we have no say in! Would I have chosen to hang around and socialize  with Theatrical people a few years ago, Nope! My Ex had more sense than that although if that was the case then I wouldn't have the pleasure of busting the chops of
drpeekaboo
 and her faithful sidekick
lk0503
 

There would also have not been a Fiesty PR and Her Silent Husband who helped me to get a "real job" Its been six months make sure Nic gets his bounty!

If you need to question my motives or my actions any further, then by all means do but realize that these are special times and they are few and far between, and like the ant says" I aint staying under the magnifying glass too long, i dont like my ass toasty"

People have come and gone, some peaceful some with Rancor. Jason Forella and Ariann always come to mind. Hell cant go anywher without their names coming up and the  whole demeanor of the room changes. To them I raise a glass, as their road will be hard and i am not sure they will reach the Winners Cricle...

So heres how my day ended up at work. With Inventory and Muckity mucks visiting I have been putting in some Long days. The icing on the cake was when one of the Sales associates came into my office and proceeded to show myself and my boss a doctors note. We had gotten wind of the fact that she was going to try and set up a workers comp claim so we were pretty much expecting it. The HR manager was there already for a different reason anyway so we figured it was a good timing thing anyway. So carol presents her doctors note and my boss reads it, she gets a shocked look on her face and proceeds to hand the note over to the HR manager. The HR manager then asked when she recieved her diagnosis. SHe then explains that it was recent. Now I have been pretty miuch running the operations side of the gallery so I asked some questions as to how and when her injury occured. The HR manger then hands me the note, it says and i kid you not nature of injury...STRAINED OVARIES...not missing a beat i say difficult to wrap them in an ace bandage! Pretty much stunned the crowd..THe woman who is in her late 50's has been a constant thorn in my managerial side so before anyone can rip out the bulletin on Inapropriate behavior I ask carol How  we can make her more comfortable until her sprain heels. As we are discussing her comfort in my own head i was playing out the examination and diagnosis....

DR: ZO does it hurt when you twist zour ovaries to za right, how about when you twist zem to the left!
DR: DO zhey hurt when zey run, how about when zey do zumping zacks.....
Carol: Yes a bit
DR: Well zen we shall put zem on light desk duty, No physical labor for zem, You know that Sprained Ovaried take much longer to heal zen busted ones, and zoo run de risk of sparaining zem in de future!

After twenty minutes of placating her and her sprained ovaries she leaves my office. I expect to get at least a warning for my comment but the hR manager simply shakes her head, she then turns to leave and simply says "ace bandage" shakes her head some more....

The horseman of the Apocalypse.....disease,famine. What is it that causes people to look for Karma, fate, the chaos theory. I do not know. I believe it what I can taste, see, smell and yes destroy. I do believe in god, sometimes he is an absentee landlord other times his beauty is present. Look into the eyes of a baby and tell me there is not a greater force at work. 

Things happen some good some awful but they happen plain and simple. Not paybacks, not leveling the playing field. Life is not some game of chance, there are no divine forces delving out retributions for misdeeds. 

Every step and every misstep has been of my own choosing not because someone pulled the string. Unfortunately I see things black and white no grey. I know many of my friends will remind that there is plenty grey in the world that's why we all get along so well.....

A quick run down of whats been happening lately. Im three weeks into a new job in the city. ITs pretty cool I work for a technology company that deals with Insurance companies so I'm kinda using my expertie from two prevous life times. Still havent gotten used to this commuting thing and actually getting up early like a grown up again! Its nice to actually get a paycheck again too! 

I am also whileing the Hours Confering with the flowers. Im playing the Scarecrow in THE WIZARD OF OZ at CAP and son of a bitch if they dont have me singing, dancing, and flopping all over the place. Its a role that definately fits me. Im enjoying it and the cast is a hoot. Diane is particulary enjoyable as The Green Menace herself!

Credit Criminal: Yea lets just say too many bills too little money. Honda decided they liked my car and just couldnt wait to get it back. After a little help from friends and not to intelligent repo guys its a past issue. But damn if they all dont keep knocking at the door!

Still Working at Tupelos on Sundays, so if anyone needs a place to Watch the Superbowl It will be on our nice 62 Inch Plasma!!!! Fridge full of Cold ones and I'm Happy!

One final Mis adventure. After Auditions for Music Man I got pulled over by one of Nassaus Finest. He was an asshat who flew by my and then u turned right up my ass. He gave me a field test and a a breathilizer. Wouldnt tell me what I blew but got all indignant with me. Wanted to know why I was at the OBI? Told him I was fighting with my (imaginary) girl friend! You ever have one of those days when sometimes it is the stupidest things that just make a crazy day a little better. Well I had one of those yesterday. It was the third day in a row that I was Working at Tupelo's, after working my real job so I was tired and stressed to begin with. This whole week has been a little off. Monday was hectic at AFlAC and then I got to the bar to find nothing done. The icing on the cake was that the tray of sliced fruit was emptied and put in the fridge. I mean the cups were emptied no olive juice remnants, no cherry juice, emptied and put in the fridge. I could go on and on but Im sure Jason has a completely different take on his closing procedure from Sunday Night. So I speak to Matt the Bar Manager and he says "apparently you guys do it to each other", because he complains when you close up too! Ahh well so I made sure the Bar was clean and stocked for the bartender on tuesday, which ends up being me again, and wednesday which becomes me again. Thank goodness I set up tuesday night because Wednesday I got slammed at Work and between Traffic and the weather I didnt get there until 5! we already had three tables in there which is unusual for 5. I also was getting grief from My Boss at AFLAC becuase he had a project he needed me to start... so what was it that made me smile you may ask?

About time some of you may say!!!! It was Daiquiri mix...yep Strawberry Daiquiri Mix...One of the Liquor reps was in for dinner and she brought in some. We don't carry it, so I cracked it open, grabbed the Cruzan Banana Rum a fresh banana and proceeded to make Strawberry Banana Daiquiris...Life was pretty good for those few minutes.....

Well , well, well  It seems I just cant get enough of the Donut Munchers.... After spending a Night of casual festivities at the Blue Honew(spelling) I was driving Dr Peekaboo home when I noticed that there was Suffolks finest on my tail. I nonchallantly mentioned this fact to her and said that I was quite sure he would be pulling me over. No sooner did these words leave my lips then the Lights came on. 

So i put on the blinker pull over to the curb as Dr Peeekaboo is saying "Dont tell me this" ofcourse I said "I won't"  and grab out Lic, regi, insurance. Put my window down and calmy wait for the Officers to come up to the car. I say officers becuase at that hour two came out, hands on thier guns(its procedure) and lights flashing in the car.

The offficer comes up to my car and ask me A) where I was coming from and B) was I drinking. So I answer A) Diner in Huntington and B) .....NO!!!! I mean really am i going to get a ticket for lieng to boot! The Oficer ask why I was swerving and I said because I was too busy arguing with her..He shook his head and said "that makes sense" and he concluded by saying you didnt seem like you were drinking anyway..... So I looked at Dr Peekaboo and as the squad car rolled off , she said that I wasnt drinking that much by my standards....In other words a mere mortsl would be in Suffolks finest custody right now!!!!!!!!! 

Moral of the story: Trust your gut no matter how polluted it is..

So its been a crazy few weeks. Between Side Show and hitting "tech"  rehearsal for Prisoner of Second Avenue, and attempting to get Charlie and the Chocolate Factory together I have just not been home that much. 

Well Saturday we were supposed to Open Second Avenue but the leads ACTUALLY refuse to go on because the set wasn't finished. It was by far the most bush league theatrical stunt I have ever seen. The closest second is sneaking Booze into the most poignant scene in LA MANCHA. Thats almost forgivable compared to this. So my weekend suddenly got freed up. Not only did they force the cancellation of Saturdays show but Sunday as well. So thus began the Marathon clean up of my apartment. I then began cleaning out my many various Fish Tanks. The 40 Gallon Shark Tank, The 30 Gallon Koi Tank, The 30 Gallon Tropical Tank and my centerpiece the 95 Gallon African Cichlid Tank. As I began to clean I noticed one of the Fish being real aggressive. Turns out she was protecting her Kids. It was pretty cool. So I switched foods and began putting in flake food so the babies could eat. 

Monday Night I get home after a CHARLIE HORSE rehearsal and figure I will chill out and finish cleaning the tank. Well I feed them and watch in amazement/ Horror as the proud mother ripped into one fish and then eat her own Baby. Apparently the other fish was planning on dining on it. 

Maybe I'm overly tired, and overly analytical but I swear She looked and said "Yea I ate my baby" better I guess then Hearing " A DINGO ATE MY BABY" But anyway what I learned

* Never piss of a Mother
* Never Pick on a Kid, NO matter how wrong they are a Mother will still Kick your Ass!
* If the Mother aint Happy No body is happy
* One Day your Happy as Littel Nemo, The next Your one of Nemo's Brothers....
* Sometimes Not even Rocks are safe places to hide
http://bknight0523.livejournal.com/7017.html
